DataElement.preferredName: Patient Contraception Or Spermatozoon Donor Agreement Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded response to questions which are necessary to allow a person to participate in a clinical trail related to the patient's agreement of contraceptives or donation of sperm as outlined in the protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Contraception Agreement Or Spermatozoon Donor Agreement Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._The prevention of conception or impregnation by the use of devices or drugs or surgery._The act of agreeing to a plan, protocol, or arrangement. Also used to describe a harmony of opinion._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._The male reproductive cell that is formed in the testicle. A sperm consists of a head, a body, and a tail that provides propulsion._One that contributes something._The act of agreeing to a plan, protocol, or arrangement. Also used to describe a harmony of opinion._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Is patient unable to refrain
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient unable to refrain from fathering a child or donating sperm for 10 days after each 18F-DCFPyL injection?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient, male, agree to remain abstinent (refrain from heterosexual intercourse) or use contraceptive measures, refrain from donating sperm, and with female partners of childbearing potential or pregnant female partners, remain abstinent or use a condom during the treatment period, for at least 4 months after the last dose of study drug, and refrain from donating sperm during this same period?
